title: The Heroes and The Demons
description: Cooper Matthews woke up for school just like any other day. Only this wasn't any other day; this was the day he died.He awoke in Valhalla, the Norse afterlife originally for those who died in combat. However, it's not quite as Cooper remembers from the history books. For one thing, there are no Gods and for another, this supposed paradise is on the cusp of war with Hell.Can Cooper go from student to master swordsman in order to defend Valhalla from the people of Hell?
author: Freddie Freeman
